description: {"blocks":[{"key":"3ip49","text":"WU sn-prep Protocol for Solid Tumors -snRNA protocol v2.7","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":57}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"evgcl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4q2pn","text":"1x Lysis buffer (2mL):","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"784fc","text":"10mM Tris-HCl (pH 7.4) (Thermo; 15567027), 20 uL","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f9sv3","text":"10mM NaCl (Thermo; AM9759), 4 uL","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5vgj1","text":"3 mM MgCl2 (Thermo; AM9530G), 6 uL","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ct49c","text":"NP-40 substitute (Sigma, 74385-1L), 2 uL","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"erhoe","text":"1 M DTT (Sigma, 646563), 2 uL","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ea4a","text":"Nuclease Free Water (Invitrogen, AM9937), 1.966 mL","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6gnfo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3egav","text":"Lysis Dilution Buffer (10 mL):","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ep0qb","text":"10mM Tris-HCl (pH 7.4) (Thermo; 15567027), 100 uL","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3k530","text":"10mM NaCl (Thermo; AM9759), 20 uL","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7joht","text":"3 mM MgCl2 (Thermo; AM9530G), 30 uL","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5rvsg","text":"1 M DTT (Sigma, 646563), 10 uL","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ufg2","text":"Nuclease Free Water (Invitrogen, AM9937), 9.840 mL","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"csr49","text":"Wash and Resuspension buffer (WR buffer):","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8i2ho","text":"1X PBS, 8 mL","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a7tca","text":"10% Stock BSA Solution (MACS, 130-091-376), 2 mL","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8n3u5","text":"0.1x Lysis Buffer (10 mL):","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"36i83","text":"1x Lysis Buffer (1mL) + Lysis Dilution Buffer (9 mL)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bfh28","text":"Glass homogenizers (Fisher: 2mL tube- K8853030002, Small clearance pestle- K8853020002, Large clearance pestle- K8853010002)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8ltr2","text":"Storage buffer:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6eve5","text":"1X PBS +2% BSA + 10% glycerol (for freezing) + 0.2U/ul RNase inhibitor","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bv0kf","text":"Hard to pipette 100% glycerol. Please make 60% glycerol in 1X PBS. Do a 1:2 mix with the Wash and Resuspension buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"96umh","text":"•\tKeep everything on ice (or in the cold room).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bcmer","text":"•\tUse RNase free reagents and consumables (Use filtered tips). ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9cp86","text":"•\tAvoid foam and bubbles as much as possible by gentle strokes and pipetting. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8f231","text":"•\tFor filtering step, remember to backwash the filter and examine the stuff blocked by the filter if necessary","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cjb91","text":"If using frozen tissue sample, use a scalpel (aided by a pair of fine forceps) to cut the cold samples (25-35mg) into 2mm pieces. Load the pieces into the glass homogenizer. Homogenize by 4-6 pushes and 4-6 pulls using the pestle in a glass homogenizer in 1 ml of ice-cold 0.1X lysis buffer with 30 uL (40 U/ul) RNase Inhibitor. Incubate on ice for 1 min with an additional 1 ml of 0.1X cold lysis buffer. Pipette gently for 4 times. Incubate on ice again for up to 1 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8osj3","text":"If using pulverized powder, start with 15-35 mg total. Pipette the powder/lysis buffer mix gently for 6-8 times. Let sit on ice for 30”. Pipette another 4-6 times. Incubate on ice again for 1’ – could be reduced (to like 20-45”). You may choose to homogenize via pestle for 3-4 push/pulls.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f4mfu","text":"Transfer this to a 5ml Eppendorf tube. Centrifuge at 500g for 6’ at 4°C and resuspend in up to 400ul Wash buffer + ~10 uL RNase inhibitor.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"41dpp","text":"Filter the homogenate through a 40mm cell strainer on ice. Wash the filter with 1ml wash buffer. Collect this into the same filtrate, so the total filtrate is 3 ml. If there is still tissue on the strainer, backwash with 2 mL 0.1x Lysis buffer, and follow previous steps again. If going to FACS with the backwash, proceed with this sample as if it were a different tissue and then sort into same collection tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f2aqi","text":"Transfer into a FACS tube and add 1 uL 7-AAD per 500 uL of sample, and incubate for 10 minutes before FACS. After resuspending sample in wash buffer, if small chunks are still visible (after ~3 minutes of resuspension) use 40 uM mini-strainer over FACS tube to remove chunks (proceeding to FACS with sample in current condition will clog machine and will result in additional lost sample).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7u7p","text":"Add 50 uL WR buffer into a 2 mL nonbinding tube for collection with 10 uL RNAse inhibitor. Collect ~100K nuclei into collection tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"234f1","text":"Once FACS is done, centrifuge at 500g for 6’ at 4°C, remove supernatant but leave ~40 uL left in tube. Resuspend in additional WR buffer + RNase inhibitor as needed if too concentrated. Count and check nuclei quality under the microscope and prepare for loading according to the 10X protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: WU sn-prep Protocol for Solid Tumors - snRNA protocol v2.8
